code: function isNotFilled(x){return x===undefined||x===null||x==='';}export default(function(columns,data){var requiredUnfilledColumns=columns.filter(function(column){return column.required&&isNotFilled(data[column.name]);});if(requiredUnfilledColumns.length>0){var message;if(requiredUnfilledColumns.length==1){message="Le champ requis ".concat(requiredUnfilledColumns.map(function(x){return x.label;}).join(", ")," n'a pas \xE9t\xE9 rempli");}else{message="Les champs requis ".concat(requiredUnfilledColumns.map(function(x){return x.label;}).join(", ")," n'ont pas \xE9t\xE9 remplis");}window.swal({title:"Erreur",text:message,dangerMode:true});return false;}return true;});
